statements: DELETE FROM quantum_communication_sessions WHERE participant_1_name = 'Alice' OR participant_2_name = 'Bob';
DELETE FROM quantum_communication_sessions WHERE participant_1_name = 'Alice' AND participant_2_name = 'Bob';
DELETE FROM session_participants WHERE participant_id = 100 AND session_id = 200;
DELETE FROM session_metadata WHERE session_status = 'Completed' AND session_date < '2021-06-30';
DELETE FROM quantum_communication_sessions WHERE participant1_id = 123 AND participant2_id = 456;
DELETE FROM quantum_messages WHERE receiver_id = '9c85a897-2e4a-4f7b-9467-674beb256207' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
